scenes.name: Cryosleep Chamber
scenes.description: A dimly lit room filled with cryosleep pods, some of which are malfunctioning. This is where the player awakens and begins their journey.

scenes.name: Central Corridor
scenes.description: A long, narrow corridor running through the Orion, lined with doors leading to various compartments. It's eerily quiet with flickering lights.

scenes.name: Crew Quarters
scenes.description: Personal rooms of the crew, now abandoned. The player can find personal belongings and logs here that provide clues about the crew and the alien.

scenes.name: Engineering Bay
scenes.description: The heart of the ship's mechanical systems. The player must repair various systems here to progress in the game.

scenes.name: Command Center
scenes.description: The control room of the Orion. The player can access ship's logs, navigation, and communication systems here.

scenes.name: Storage Room
scenes.description: A large room filled with crates, tools, and the Alien Artifact. The player must decide the fate of the artifact here.

scenes.name: Observation Deck
scenes.description: A room with large windows offering a view of space. The player can find navigation charts and star maps here.

scenes.name: Auxiliary Shuttle Bay
scenes.description: A small bay housing the auxiliary shuttle. The player must repair the shuttle here to escape.

scenes.name: Alien Nest
scenes.description: A hidden section of the ship taken over by the alien. It's dangerous, but crucial for confronting the alien or using the egg.

scenes.name: Communication Room
scenes.description: A room dedicated to ship-to-ship and long-distance communication. The player can send a distress signal from here.

scenes.name: Medical Bay
scenes.description: A facility for medical treatment. The player can find first aid here and clues about the crew's health before the disaster.

scenes.name: Research Lab
scenes.description: A lab for scientific experiments. Contains information about the alien and potential ways to combat it.

scenes.name: Maintenance Tunnels
scenes.description: Narrow, claustrophobic tunnels running through the ship. The player can use these to avoid the alien or access blocked areas.

scenes.name: Rec Room
scenes.description: A communal area for the crew to relax. The player can find personal items and clues about the crew's relationships here.

scenes.name: Airlock
scenes.description: An exit point from the ship into space. The player may need to venture outside for repairs or to avoid the alien.

scenes.name: Ship's Archive
scenes.description: A room containing the ship's historical records, manuals, and schematics. Essential for understanding and repairing the Orion.
